mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, ID, NAME, GENDER, ADDRESS) VALUES (MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{address})
mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.MEMBER_NO, A.ID, A.NAME, A.GENDER, A.ADDRESS FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, MEMBER_NO, ID, NAME, GENDER, ADDRESS FROM MEMBER) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
